service.name: app-issue-tracker
service.description: File-based issue tracking system with AI investigation using Claude Code - no database required

codex.description: AI agent for issue investigation and fix generation (primary)

claude-code.description: AI agent for issue investigation and fix generation (alternative)

qdrant.description: Optional vector database for semantic search of issues

health.description: App Issue Tracker health check configuration

steps.name: create-issues-structure
steps.run: mkdir -p issues/{open,investigating,in-progress,fixed,closed,failed,templates}

steps.name: migrate-from-database
steps.run: bash scripts/migrate-to-files.sh migrate || echo '  Migration completed or no database found'
steps.description: Migrate existing PostgreSQL data to YAML files

steps.name: install-management-cli
steps.run: ln -sf $(pwd)/issues/manage.sh ~/.local/bin/issue-manager 2>/dev/null || echo '  Management CLI available at ./issues/manage.sh'
steps.description: Make issue management CLI globally available

steps.name: install-main-cli
steps.run: ln -sf $(pwd)/cli/app-issue-tracker.sh ~/.local/bin/app-issue-tracker 2>/dev/null || echo '  CLI available at ./cli/app-issue-tracker.sh'

steps.name: build-file-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o app-issue-tracker-api .

steps.name: setup-vector-search
steps.run: if command -v curl >/dev/null && curl -s http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -X PUT "http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections/issues" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"vectors": {"size": 1536, "distance": "Cosine"}}' >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; echo '  Qdrant collection setup completed'; else echo '  Qdrant not available, semantic search disabled'; fi

develop.description: Start file-based issue tracker with Go API server

steps.name: start-api
steps.run: cd api && API_WS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS='*' ./app-issue-tracker-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && VROOLI_LIFECYCLE_MANAGED=true npm run dev

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo 'ðŸ“ File-Based Issue Tracker running:
  ðŸŒ Web UI (dev): http://localhost:$UI_PORT
  ðŸ“¡ API: http://localhost:$API_PORT
  ðŸŽ¯ CLI: app-issue-tracker --help
  ðŸ“Š Management: ./issues/manage.sh status

ðŸ“ Create issues:

ðŸ“‚ File Operations:
  ls issues/open/*.yaml
  mv issues/open/001-bug.yaml issues/investigating/
  ./issues/manage.sh search "keyword"'

steps.name: test-file-structure
steps.run: test -d issues/open && test -d issues/templates && echo 'âœ“ Directory structure exists' || (echo 'âœ— Directory structure missing' && exit 1)

steps.name: test-templates
steps.run: test -f issues/templates/bug-template.yaml && test -f issues/templates/feature-template.yaml && echo 'âœ“ Templates exist' || (echo 'âœ— Templates missing' && exit 1)

steps.name: test-management-cli
steps.run: bash issues/manage.sh status

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build . && rm test-build
steps.description: Test Go compilation for file-based API

steps.name: test-file-api-health
steps.run: curl -sf http://localhost:$API_PORT/health && echo 'âœ“ File-based API healthy' || echo 'âš  API not running (expected if not started)'

steps.name: test-issue-creation
steps.run: bash -c 'cd "$PWD" && timeout 10s ./issues/manage.sh status > /dev/null && echo "âœ“ Issue management working"' || echo 'âš  Issue management test skipped'

steps.name: test-main-cli
steps.run: bash cli/app-issue-tracker.sh --help | grep -q 'App Issue Tracker' && echo 'âœ“ CLI working' || echo 'âš  CLI test skipped'

steps.name: stop-api
steps.run: pkill -f "app-issue-tracker-api" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "app-issue-tracker-api" 2>/dev/null || true

steps.name: stop-ui
steps.run: pkill -f "scenarios/app-issue-tracker.*vite" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "scenarios/app-issue-tracker.*vite" 2>/dev/null || true

clean.description: Clean up file-based issue tracker data

steps.name: archive-issues
steps.run: bash issues/manage.sh archive 90 || echo 'Archive completed'

steps.name: backup-before-clean
steps.run: mkdir -p backup/clean-$(date +%Y%m%d) && cp -r issues backup/clean-$(date +%Y%m%d)/ && echo 'Backup created in backup/clean-$(date +%Y%m%d)/'

steps.name: run-phased-tests
steps.run: test/run-tests.sh
